mapper.insert: insert into driver( d_idx, d_userId, d_userPw, d_userName, d_userEmail, d_idNum1, d_idNum2, d_licenseNum, d_licenseDate, d_carNum) values( memberPK.nextVal, #{d_userId}, #{d_userPw}, #{d_userName}, #{d_userEmail}, #{d_idNum1}, #{d_idNum2} , #{d_licenseNum}, #{d_licenseDate}, #{d_carNum})
